Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = nil for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Humanoid") then Humanoid = v break end end if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "MousePosition" then return {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target} end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Pie = script.Parent HitSound = Pie:WaitForChild("Hit")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BodyGyro = Pie:WaitForChild("BodyGyro") BodyForce = Pie:WaitForChild("BodyForce") Creator = Pie:WaitForChild("creator") Damage = Pie:WaitForChild("Damage")
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Stick(Hit)
local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Name = "PieWeld" Weld.Part0 = Pie Weld.Part1 = Hit
local HitPos = Pie.Position
local CF = CFrame.new(HitPos) local C0 = (Pie.CFrame:inverse() * CF) local C1 = (Hit.CFrame:inverse() * CF)
Weld.C0 = C0 Weld.C1 = C1
Weld.Parent = Pie
end
function DamageCharacter(character) local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player and (player == Creator.Value or IsTeamMate(Creator.Value, player)) then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not humanoid or humanoid.Health == 0 then return end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Creator) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage.Value) end
function Touched(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or string.find(string.lower(Hit.Name), "pie") then return end local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Tool") then return end if character:IsA("Accessory") then character = character.Parent end local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player and player == Creator.Value then return end for i, v in pairs({BodyGyro, BodyForce}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end Stick(Hit) HitSound:Play() local character = Hit.Parent DamageCharacter(character)
if Connection then Connection:disconnect() end
end
Connection = Pie.Touched:connect(Touched)
for i = 1, 10 do wait(0.1 * i) if BodyGyro then local v = Pie.Velocity.unit BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(10000, 10000, 10000) BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), -v) end end
wait(8)
Pie:Destroy()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Sounds = { Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire"), Hit = Handle:WaitForChild("Hit"), }
PieScript = Tool:WaitForChild("PieScript")
Pies = { {MeshId = 18417911, TextureId = 18417918, Name = "ApplePie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.825, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 5, Percentage = 90}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311968, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = true, Damage = 6, Percentage = 75}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311869, Name = "BlueberryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = true, Damage = 6, Percentage = 75}, {MeshId = 143518445, TextureId = 143499030, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.35, 0.5), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 8), (math.pi / 2), 0), Offset = Vector3.new(-0.05, 0.85, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, (math.pi / 1)), RotateFace = false, Damage = 7, Percentage = 65}, {MeshId = 65950268, TextureId = 65950352, Name = "PumpkinPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.6), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(-0.05, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = true, Damage = 8, Percentage = 50}, {MeshId = 18453224, TextureId = 18453205, Name = "PumpkinPi", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 10, Percentage = 35}, {MeshId = 148484293, TextureId = 148484299, Name = "PiSymbol", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.65, 0.75), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 35, Percentage = 15}, {MeshId = 125732887, TextureId = 125728597, Name = "PizzaPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.6, 0.6, 0.6), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 20), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(-0.05, 0.75, -0.05), FiringAngle = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 6, Percentage = 25} }
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.Anchored = false BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Enabled = true
function RandomByPercent(Table) local Max = 0 for i, v in pairs(Table) do Max = (Max + v.Percentage) end local Chosen = (math.random() * Max) local Last local Total = 0 for i, v in pairs(Table) do Total = (Total + v.Percentage) Last = v if Total >= Chosen then break end end return Last, Chosen end
function CreatePie() for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end ChosenPie = RandomByPercent(Pies) Pie = BasePart:Clone() Pie.Name = ChosenPie.Name Pie.Size = ChosenPie.Size local PieMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") PieMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh PieMesh.MeshId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.MeshId PieMesh.TextureId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.TextureId PieMesh.Scale = ChosenPie.Scale PieMesh.Parent = Pie Pie.Parent = Tool Pie.CFrame = Handle.CFrame Pie.CFrame = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, Handle.CFrame.lookVector) PieWeld = Instance.new("Motor6D") PieWeld.Part0 = Handle PieWeld.Part1 = Pie PieWeld.C0 = (PieWeld.C0 * ChosenPie.Angle + ChosenPie.Offset) PieWeld.Parent = Pie end
function Fire(v) if not CheckIfAlive() or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false if not Pie or not Pie.Parent or not PieWeld or not PieWeld.Parent then CreatePie() else
local LocalPie = Pie local LocalChosenPie = ChosenPie Pie = nil Sounds.Fire:Play()
local Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.force = Vector3.new(0, 24 ,0) Force.Parent = LocalPie
local Gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") Gyro.D = 500 Gyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) Gyro.P = 3000 Gyro.Parent = LocalPie
local HitSound = Sounds.Hit:Clone() HitSound.Parent = LocalPie
local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Value = Player Creator.Name = "creator" Creator.Parent = LocalPie
local Damage_Tag = Instance.new("NumberValue") Damage_Tag.Value = (LocalChosenPie.Damage * 2) Damage_Tag.Name = "Damage" Damage_Tag.Parent = LocalPie
local PieScriptClone = PieScript:Clone() PieScriptClone.Disabled = false PieScriptClone.Parent = LocalPie
if PieWeld and PieWeld.Parent then PieWeld:Destroy() end
local Launch = (Handle.Position + 5 * v) LocalPie.CFrame = CFrame.new(Launch + ((LocalChosenPie.RotateFace and v) or Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)), Launch + ((not LocalChosenPie.RotateFace and v) or Vector3.new(0, 0, 0))) LocalPie.CFrame = LocalPie.CFrame * LocalChosenPie.FiringAngle LocalPie.Velocity = v * 100 Debris:AddItem(LocalPie, 10) LocalPie.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
end wait(0.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Activated() if not CheckIfAlive() or not Tool.Enabled then return end local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition").Position local TargetPos = MousePosition local LookAt = (TargetPos - Handle.Position).unit Fire(LookAt) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
CreatePie()
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
